name: Baterizer
description:
Baterizer a game where you play as a robot with a mission and that mission is to get as many batteries as you can before getting devoured by the evil battery munching smily faced robots.

how long will you survive until you meet your destruction?

This game was made for the #6 Curdle Jam

You play with the mouse buttons and move with the WASD keys

Modeling/Animating/Coding : Akira ( Twitter)

Rigging/Sound/Music: Denan
